task.title: Create a Logic Pro X file
task.shortdesc: Through this document you can learn how to create a logic pro x file.

taskbody.context: Logic Pro X projects are contained within logic files. In order to manage your projects successfully, you must understand how to create a logic file.

steps.stepsection: To create a logic file, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Open the Logic Pro X application.
Select "Empty Project" in the top left corner.
Select "Choose" in the bottom right corner.
Select "File" in the top left corner.
Select "Save File As" in the drop down menu.
Enter a name for your file and select "save."
